synthesis_conditions.notes: Heating MAF-23 under these conditions yielded yellow crystals of [Zn2(btm)-(btk)], denoted as MAF-23-O. The oxidation ratio was determined by 1H NMR analysis. Conversion of btm2@ to btk2@ in the crystals can only reach 50%. Further increasing the reaction temperature and/or reaction time led to framework decomposition/collapse.

Derived from MAF-23 by heating under specified conditions. The oxidation process selectively oxidizes half of the soft methylene bridges to form more polar and rigid carbonyl bridges, improving C3H6/C3H8 adsorption selectivity.
